meanings.sent1: She outburned the candle by leaving it lit all night.
meanings.sent2: The bonfire outburned all the other fires at the campsite.
meanings.sent3: The race to finish the marshmallows first was won by the outburned marshmallow.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music outburned all other interests in his life.
meanings.sent5: The sun outburned the clouds, shining brightly in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The old book was outburned in the fire, turning to ashes.
meanings.sent2: The wooden house outburned quickly in the raging inferno.
meanings.sent3: The toast was accidentally outburned, creating a charred smell in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks outburned with embarrassment when she tripped in front of everyone.
meanings.sent5: The memories of that day outburned in his mind, never fading away.
